text: Riddleton is an unincorporated community located within Alloway Township in Salem County, New Jersey, United States.Locality Search, State of New Jersey. The vicinity used to have a stop on the West Jersey and Seashore Railroad.Place Names of Salem County N.J., West Jersey History Project ==References== Category:Alloway Township, New Jersey Category:Unincorporated communities in Salem County, New Jersey Category:Unincorporated communities in New Jersey
title: Riddleton, New Jersey
